channel.title: Crossbow Scope Not Visible
channel.description: Up until a few hours ago I thought that the crossbow just zoomed in when you scoped. Apparently I was wrong, the whole time my crossbow scope just wasn't showing up.

item.title: Crossbow Scope Not Visible
item.dc:creator: Crawfish
item.description:
You might try switching your ironsight settings? I don’t know if they effect the crossbow, but I know they effect the magnum.

Read full topic

item.title: Crossbow Scope Not Visible
item.dc:creator: babyavery
item.description:
Up until a few hours ago I thought that the crossbow just zoomed in when you scoped. Apparently I was wrong, the whole time my crossbow scope just wasn’t showing up.
